description: Information about a single microscope channel.
title: imaging_channels

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

channel_name.description: User given name e.g. blue.  If there is an accompanying code book, the name here should correspond to a channel number used in the code book.

excitation_wavelength.description: Excitation wavelength of the lightsource in nm.

filter_range.description: Wavelength range of the emission filter in nanometers.

multiplexed.description: Is this channel part of a multiplexed experiment? Should be yes or no.

target_fluorophore.description: The name(s) of the fluorophore(s) this channel is designed to assay.

exposure_time.description: Exposure time - as a floating point number - in miliseconds
